marklogic.body:
There are 18 pitchers on this list. You figure that based the very real chance that your starters won't work late into games based on past experience, Buck will almost have to carry 13 pitchers. I actually think coming up with 5 Off this list is pretty easy in my opinion. Now this isn't necessarily who I think will be gone but it is who I would do something with. Starters at this point: Arrieta, Hammel, Chen, Hunter, Matusz (not necessarily the starting order). Relief: Wada (long), Tillman (long),(will probably need two long relief guys for a little while and this would give Wada a chance to catch up), Lindstrom, Johnson, Strop, Patton, Phillips, Eveland. The rest I would option, trade, or cut (mainly Greg, not worth holding a slot for).
Position players: Teagarden probably starts either on DL or at rehab assignment or extended spring training, So Weiters and Paulino come north, Outfielders Miller released he really has not had a very good spring even when he wasn't dealing with an injury, Then it comes down to Betemit and Johnson as to who you bring north. I would probably say Betemit. Then one more Spot needs to be taken care of and that would be a tough decision.
